tool_description: Calculates final refund amounts based on original purchase price, condition assessment, return policy, and applicable fees.

return_authorization_number.description: Return authorization number for refund calculation

original_payment_method.description: Original payment method: credit_card, debit_card, paypal, store_credit, cash

restocking_fee_applicable.description: Whether restocking fee should be applied

shipping_refund_requested.description: Whether to refund original shipping costs

error_messages: Invalid return authorization: Authorization number not found.
Invalid inspection report: Report ID not found or incomplete.
Invalid payment method: Must be one of [credit_card, debit_card, paypal, store_credit, cash].
Calculation error: Unable to determine refund amount due to missing pricing data.
Policy violation: Refund calculation violates company return policy rules.
usage: Input return_authorization_number, inspection_report_id, and original_payment_method. Optionally specify restocking_fee_applicable and shipping_refund_requested flags.

final_refund_amount.description: Total refund amount after all adjustments

refund_method.description: Method for issuing refund based on original payment
